original_title: Six people including three Police officers arrested in Keselwatte
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Six people including three Police officers who were behaving in an unruly manner were arrested in Keselwatte, Colombo.
Sri Lanka Police said a scuffle broke out between three officers attached to the Mounted Division and a group of people working at a restaurant in Keselwatte.
Sri Lanka Police said the arrested group was released on bail after being produced before the court.
